channel.title: Books on Modeling of Everything
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Modeling of Everything

item.title: Books I read in 2020
item.description: 2020 will mark its place in modern history and thank everyone, it is coming to an end now. Look back 2020, I have learnt a lot in this special year. Here I just want to share some books that I found most helpful! Streaming systems: The what, where, when and how of larege-scale data processing (By Tyler Akidau, Slava Chernyak, Reuven Lax) This is a very good book from Google.
